Kings Norton: Station workingTo allow EMU shunt moves to take place robustly, trains must not be given a shunt stop at Longbridge whenarriving from Barnt Green on the SL. Services are to be allocated pathing time between the two locations or atimed stop at Longbridge Signal 23.

column4: 10 Must have a minimum of 6 minutes after a timed arrival intothe turnback siding, subject to an overall minimum of 10minutes. All crossing movements must be timed.
